long_description: When it's a question of survival, the Leatherman Raptor Shears medical multitool answers loud and clear with the necessary tools to quickly go to work in an emergency situation. Designed with the input of medics, EMTs and firefighters, the Raptor balances multiple medical features with simplicity-no overkill of tools to complicate the scene. Tools include 420HC stainless-steel folding medical shears, strap cutter, ring cutter, 5cm ruler, oxygen-tank wrench and carbide glass breaker. Stainless-steel components; glass-filled nylon handle scales; injection-molded polymer holster; lanyard hole; replaceable pocket clip.
short_description: When it's a question of survival, the Leatherman Raptor Shears medical multitool answers loud and clear with the necessary tools to quickly go to work in an emergency situation.
